Coffee Cake Idea
Cake
125g walnuts
125g hazelnuts
150g butter
200g brown sugar
2 eggs
1 egg yolk
50g Plain flour
1 tsp Baking powder
2g salt
1tbsp instant coffee, dissolved in as little hot water as possible
20ml vanilla essence
50ml oil
Icing
160g icing sugar
80g butter
1 teaspoon instant coffee, disolved in 1 tsp vanilla essence ( or hot water if that doesn't work)
Never tried
    Cake
  1. Roast nuts. Chop the walnuts, and grind the hazelnuts
  2. Cream the butter and sugar, stir in the nuts, gradually beat in the eggs
  3. Combine the flour, baking powder and salt, and fold into the mix
  4. Combine the coffee vanilla and oil, and fold into the mix
  5. Bake at 160C until done
    6. Icing
  6. Beat the butter until soft
  7. Then sieve the icing sugar, and gradually beat into the butter
  8. Then beat int the coffee/vanilla mix
Footer. Not much here really. Nice to have a footer though.
